attributes.name: INodeOperatorsRegistry
addNodeOperator

attributes.documentation: @notice Change human-readable name of the node operator #`_id` to `_name`
attributes.name: setNodeOperatorName

attributes.documentation: @notice Change reward address of the node operator #`_id` to `_rewardAddress`
attributes.name: setNodeOperatorRewardAddress

attributes.documentation: @notice Set the maximum number of validators to stake for the node operator #`_id` to `_stakingLimit`
attributes.name: setNodeOperatorStakingLimit

attributes.documentation: @notice Report `_stoppedIncrement` more stopped validators of the node operator #`_id`
attributes.name: reportStoppedValidators

attributes.documentation:
@notice Remove unused signing keys
@dev Function is used by the pool
attributes.name: trimUnusedKeys

attributes.documentation: @notice Returns total number of node operators
attributes.name: getNodeOperatorsCount

attributes.documentation: @notice Returns number of active node operators
attributes.name: getActiveNodeOperatorsCount
getNodeOperator

attributes.documentation:
@notice Returns the rewards distribution proportional to the effective stake for each node operator.
@param _totalRewardShares Total amount of reward shares to distribute.
attributes.name: getRewardsDistribution

attributes.documentation:
@notice Selects and returns at most `_numKeys` signing keys (as well as the corresponding
        signatures) from the set of active keys and marks the selected keys as used.
        May only be called by the pool contract.
     * @param _numKeys The number of keys to select. The actual number of selected keys may be less
       due to the lack of active keys.
attributes.name: assignNextSigningKeys
addSigningKeys
removeSigningKey

attributes.documentation: @notice Returns total number of signing keys of the node operator #`_operator_id`
attributes.name: getTotalSigningKeyCount

attributes.documentation: @notice Returns number of usable signing keys of the node operator #`_operator_id`
attributes.name: getUnusedSigningKeyCount
getSigningKey

attributes.documentation: @dev This is a mock. Don't use in production.
attributes.name: PoolMock
